fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose another player to repair if they get attacked. That will grant them Powerful Defense and remove any negative effects from them.
- Choose another player to revive at the start of the next day. (0 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your revival ability cannot be refilled except by being Upgraded.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- Upon being Upgraded, you will gain one use of your Revival ability.
- Targets you repair will gain Unstoppable Defense instead.
